title: [A comedy concernynge thre lawes, of nature Moses, & Christ, corrupted by the sodomytes. Pharysees and Papystes Compyled by Iohan Bale. Anno M. D.XXXVIII.]
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publisher: Anno M. D. XXXVIII, and lately inprented per Nicolaum Bamburgensem [i.e. Dirik van der Straten],
notes: Imprint from colophon is false; actual printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
